Text:
NOTE: This copy has English SRT file included, this copy does not have any hard coded subs, the srt file contains English subtitles for entire movie...

SUBTITLE SOURCE - AbSurdiTy

Thanks for the up, hiest.

Great Movie, real good picture & audio. BUT - pretty crap subs that need to be turned off, they're so annoying. (They translate (badly) everything - English AND Italian!) Who needs the distraction? So, this link will take you to another AbSurdiTy supplied sub just for the Italian. 
Thanks again, hiest.

http://www.opensubtitles.org/en/subtitles/4685833/to-rome-with-love-en
